_header: As Jesu went in the Jewry
_description: Gospel for Monday after Passion Sunday, in ‘expanded’ Northern Homily Cycle — in couplets

BLHar4196.First Lines: Als ihesu crist went in þe iewryvnto him had þai grete enuy…
BLHar4196.Last Lines: …And als a water his hert þan flowesfful of grace and gude vertuse
BLHar4196.Attributed Title: fferia ii proxima secundum Iohannem (rubric, f. 63rb)
BLHar4196.Editions:
Nevanlinna,  Sara. 
             The Northern Homily Cycle: The Expanded Version in MSS Harley 4196 and Cotton Tiberius E.vii.
             3 vols. 
             Memoires de la Societé Neophilologique de Helsinki.
         Helsinki. 38 (1972); 41 (1973); and 43 (1984): II. 146-147.
